venues.name: Lake Austin Spa Resort
venues.review: An all-inclusive spa resort on the banks of Lake Austin that consistently ranks among the best in the country, and earns it. The LakeHouse Spa, outdoor pools, botanical gardens, and treatment options are all exceptional. Day passes exist. Staying is better.

venues.name: Hiatus Spa + Retreat
venues.review: Austin's most consistently excellent urban day spa. Not a resort, not a hotel amenity — a standalone spa that takes its craft seriously. The thermal circuit access with cold plunge and steam is solid, the treatment menu is thoughtful.

venues.name: Austin Float Center
venues.review: Austin's most dedicated float operation. Multiple tank options, clean facilities, and a staff that actually knows what float therapy does to your nervous system. East Austin location means you can go after dinner and walk to something good.
